description: SpaceX is developing a simplified Starship mission for NASA’s Artemis III Moon landing, targeting a quicker and safer return of astronauts. As NASA reopens the lander contract amid delays, SpaceX says its refined Starship design could take on more mission roles, advancing lunar exploration toward the first crewed landing this decade.
title: SpaceX Revises Artemis III Moon Mission with Simplified Starship Design

description: Scientists have detected two unusual black hole mergers showing signs of “second-generation” origins — meaning each large black hole likely formed from an earlier merger. The gravitational-wave signals also matched Einstein’s predictions on spinning black holes, offering fresh proof of general relativity and new insights into how black holes grow in crowded star systems.
title: Rare ‘Second-Generation’ Black Holes Detected, Proving Einstein Right Again

description: Google is reportedly to be working to modify the AOD feature in Android 17. The company could release a new"Min Mode" which could allow third-party apps to display their own persistent, minimalist interfaces directly on the AOD. Google Maps is expected to use this feature first. The 'Min Mode' may allow display of the full-screen application interface.
title: Google's 'Min Mode' for Always-on Display Mode Spotted in Development on Android 17: Report

description: Meta has introduced passkey support for encrypted WhatsApp chat backups, letting users restore encrypted chats using fingerprint, face, or screen lock instead of passwords or 64-digit keys. Passkeys are securely stored in a password manager for safer, simpler access. The feature, rolling out globally soon, enhances end-to-end encryption introduced in 2021. Users can enable it via Settings > Chats > End-to-end encrypted backup on Android or iOS. Notably, encrypted WhatsApp backups aren’t included in regular iCloud or iTunes backups on iPhone.
title: How to Set Up WhatsApp's End-to-End Encrypted Chat Backups With a Passkey: A Step-By-Step Guide

description: Seventeen years after Satoshi Nakamoto published the Bitcoin whitepaper on Halloween 2008, the cryptocurrency has evolved from an experimental idea into a trillion-dollar financial phenomenon. As Bitcoin continues to define digital finance, industry leaders share insights on how its journey has shaped trust, transparency, and innovation across the global economy.
title: From Halloween Mystery to Global Phenomenon, Satoshi Nakamoto’s Bitcoin Whitepaper Turns 17

description: iQOO 15 will be launched in India on November 26, the iQOO India head recently announced. A dedicated microsite for the handset recently went live, confirming that the handset will be sold in the country via Amazon with a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip, Android 16-based OriginOS 6, and a 2K resolution display with up to a 144Hz refresh rate. Now, the company has revealed the names of the iQOO 15's two colour options in India. The handset debuted in China on October 20, and is currently on sale in four colourways.
title: iQOO 15 Colour Options Confirmed Ahead of November 26 India Launch: Here’s What We Know So Far

description: OpenAI has updated its Sora app for iOS with new creative tools, including Character Cameo, which lets users turn short videos and audio of pets, objects, or drawings into reusable characters. The update also introduces Video Stitching for combining clips and new Leaderboards for social engagement. For a limited time, Sora’s invite restriction has been lifted in the US.
title: OpenAI Upgrades Sora App With Character Cameos, Video Stitching and Leaderboard

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge is not entirely discontinued. Instead, Samsung is said to be preparing a new smartphone with an ultra-slim build under a new name. The upcoming model is said to be thinner than the Galaxy S25 Edge and iPhone Air. It is said to come with an Exynos 2600 chipset and a dual rear camera unit. It could measure 5.56mm in thickness.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Could Feature Model Slimmer Than Galaxy S25 Edge With New Name

description: Samsung is likely introducing a new AI-powered feature called Priority Notifications with its upcoming One UI 8.5 update and has now been spotted for the first time. Recently spotted in a leaked firmware, the feature is expected to highlight important alerts at the top of the notification panel, using Galaxy AI for on-device processing. Users can customise which apps send high-priority alerts. It is expected to debut alongside the Galaxy S26 series early next year.
title: Samsung's AI-Powered Priority Notifications Spotted in New One UI 8.5 Leak

description: Starlink recently achieved a new feat by launching its 10,000th satellite in space, after 28 satellites blasted off from Vandenberg Space Force Base in California. A wholly-owned subsidiary of Elon Musk-led SpaceX, the company has been planning to expand its presence across the globe. Now, the company has posted four new job postings in India for its Bengaluru office. The SatCom firm is also planning to set up multiple gateway Earth stations across India, critical for it to provide its internet services in remote regions of the country.
title: Starlink Hiring for Payments, Tax and Accounting Roles in Bengaluru as Firm Prepares for Launch in India

description: Xiaomi and its subbrands are gearing up to launch a slew of smartphones in global markets soon. Ahead of the official announcement, they have been spotted on the Infocomm Media Development Authority (IMDA) certification site. The purported listing suggests the model numbers and a few connectivity options of the phones.  The devices spotted include a global variant of Xiaomi 17, Poco F8 Pro, Poco F8 Ultra and Redmi Note 15 4G.
title: Xiaomi 17, Poco F8 Series and Redmi Note 15 Listed on IMDA Certification Website Hinting at Imminent Global Launch

description: Bitcoin’s price hovered near $109,900 (roughly Rs. 97.5 lakh) on Friday after the Federal Reserve’s cautious remarks dampened risk appetite. Despite a 25bps rate cut earlier in the week, comments by Fed Chair Jerome Powell signalled uncertainty on future policy moves, dragging the broader crypto market lower. Ethereum and major altcoins also declined amid heavy liquidations and reduced expectations for further easing.
title: Bitcoin Slips to $109,000 as Traders React to Uncertainty Over Future US Fed Rate Cuts

description: The Indian Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-In) has issued a high-risk advisory warning Google Chrome users of multiple vulnerabilities affecting desktop versions on Windows, macOS, and Linux. The flaws, detailed in CIVN-2025-0288, could let remote attackers execute code, steal data, or bypass security by luring users to malicious websites. Affected versions include Chrome builds prior to 142.0.7444.59/60. CERT-In urges users to update to version 142.0.7444.60 or later. More details are available on Google’s Chrome Releases page dated October 28, 2025.
title: CERT-In Warns Google Chrome Users of High-Risk Flaws on Windows, macOS, and Linux

description: Honor GT 2 series is tipped to launch before the end of this year. It is said to come with the Snapdragon 8 Elite or the newer Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC. Honor could pack a larger battery on the upcoming GT series smartphone, potentially exceeding 9,000mAh capacity. It is tipped to feature a 3D ultrasonic fingerprint sensor and a 50-megapixel primary rear camera. The Honor GT 2 will succeed last year's Honor GT.
title: Honor GT 2 Series Specifications, Launch Timeline Leaked; Could Feature Flagship Snapdragon Chips

description: Kantara: Chapter 1, written and directed by Rishab Shetty, is a Kannada Period drama movie that is now streaming on Amazon Prime Video. Overall, it has been a super hit at the box office.
title: Kantara: A Legend Chapter 1 Now Streaming Online: Know Everything About Plot, Streaming, Cast, and More

description: MediaTek Dimensity 8500 chip, expected to succeed the Dimensity 8400 SoC, could be manufactured using Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company's (TSMC) 4nm process, a tipster revealed. This comes a month after the tech firm launched its flagship Dimensity 9500 chip. Earlier reports suggest that the Dimensity 8500 SoC will be featured on the Xiaomi 17T and the Honor Power 2, which might carry a 10,000mAh battery.
title: MediaTek Dimensity 8500 SoC Architecture, Specifications Leaked; Could Launch Soon

description: OnePlus 15T has surfaced again in leaks, revealing key details and its expected launch timeline. According to a tipster, the phone will feature a 6.31-inch flat OLED display with 1.5K resolution, an ultrasonic in-display fingerprint sensor, and the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. It may pack a battery of around 7,000mAh, possibly slightly smaller than the OnePlus 15’s 7,300mAh unit. Expected to launch in the first half of 2026, the device could debut in India as the OnePlus 15s.
title: OnePlus 15T Launch Timeline, Key Features Leaked Again; Could Feature a 7,000mAh Battery

description: OpenAI has unveiled an artificial intelligence (AI) agent called Aardvark that can act as a software security researcher. Built on GPT-5, the agent can analyse code, detect vulnerabilities, and propose fixes. Currently in private beta, Aardvark is being tested by partner organisations. OpenAI says the tool aims to make software systems more secure by automating vulnerability detection and remediation.
title: OpenAI Introduces Aardvark, an Agentic Security Researcher That Can Find and Fix Vulnerabilities

description: Vivo X300 Pro and Vivo X300 were unveiled in China on October 13 with a MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chipset and a Zeiss-powered triple rear camera unit. The handset is rumoured to launch in India in December, after it was unveiled globally on October 30. Now, a tipster has shared a render of the vanilla Vivo X300, which suggests that it will be offered in an India-exclusive red colourway. Moreover, only the standard model is said to offer this shade, which means the Vivo X300 Pro and Vivo X300 FE might not get the new colour.
title: Vivo X300 to Be Available in India-Exclusive Red Colourway, Tipster Claims

description: Google Pixel 10 Pro, Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, and Razr+ (2025) offer higher levels of security than Apple's iPhone 17, according to a Leviathan Security Group report, which was commissioned by Google. The cybersecurity firm tested the phones on 33 parameters, such as their "Advanced protection programs", password managers, account change protection features, and SIM theft protection. Additionally, the California-based tech giant also highlighted how its AI-enabled call filter and spam detection features aid in scam protection.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro, Galaxy Z Fold 7 Offer Better Scam, Fraud Protection Than iPhone 17 Pro: Study

description: OpenAI has introduced a paid layer to its Sora video generation app on iOS, ending the period of unlimited free access. The company now allows users to buy additional video generations once they exceed their daily limits. Bill Peebles, Head of Sora, said the move aims to make the platform financially sustainable. OpenAI is also planning to reduce daily rate limits across all subscription tiers.
title: OpenAI Tells Users to Pay for Extra AI Video Generations on the Sora App

description: The Realme GT 8 Pro is set to be launched in India in November. Ahead of its debut, the company has teased several specifications of the upcoming handset. It is confirmed to sport a display with a 2K resolution and 7,000 nits peak brightness. For multimedia consumption, the Realme flagship will have an ultra haptics motor and a symmetrical speaker. Realme GT 8 Pro will be the company's first smartphone to be powered by Qualcomm’s flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Teased to Come With 2K Display and Ultra Haptics Motor Ahead of India Launch

description: Samsung and Nvidia announced a partnership to build a new artificial intelligence (AI) megafactory on Friday. The AI megafactory will be powered by 50,000 Nvidia GPUs and will revamp the company’s entire manufacturing operation with automation. The South Korean tech giant said that AI-powered systems will be implemented across its semiconductor, smartphone, and robotics manufacturing.
title: Samsung and Nvidia Partner to Build an AI Megafactory to Automate Manufacturing

description: Samsung Galaxy Book 6 Pro is rumoured to be in development as the successor to the Galaxy Book 5 Pro. While details about its launch remain under wraps, AI PC has allegedly been listed on a benchmarking website, highlighting several of its key specifications. It is said to be powered by an Intel Core Ultra 5 processor, paired with 32GB of RAM. The Samsung Galaxy Book 6 Pro listing also sheds light on what to expect from the laptop in terms of AI performance.
title: Samsung Galaxy Book 6 Pro Allegedly Listed on Geekbench With Intel Core Ultra 5 SoC, 32GB of RAM

description: Samsung has launched the beta version of Samsung Internet for PC, making its mobile browser available on desktop for the first time. The beta, released on October 30, 2025, supports Windows 10 and 11 in the US and South Korea, with wider availability expected soon. The browser syncs data through Samsung Pass, features Galaxy AI with real-time webpage summaries and translations, and includes strong privacy tools. Samsung aims to unify its Galaxy ecosystem while competing with major AI-driven browsers.
title: Samsung Internet Browser Beta for Windows PCs Launched with Galaxy AI Integration

description: WhatsApp has reportedly developed a dedicated app for Apple Watch. It is said to be rolling out via the TestFlight beta Programme, with the 25.32.10.71  beta version for iOS. Some early beta testers can avail the feature now. The app allows users to read and reply to messages and react with emojis directly from their wrist, without taking their paired Phone.
title: WhatsApp Tests Companion App for Apple Watch With Core Messaging Functionality

description: Apple CEO Tim Cook announced holiday quarter forecasts that beat Wall Street expectations, driven by strong demand for iPhone 17 models despite supply constraints and shipping delays to China. Although iPhone sales missed fiscal Q4 targets, Apple compensated with robust performance in other areas, including AI-powered AirPods that translate languages. Overall revenue and profit exceeded analyst estimates, showcasing Apple’s resilience and innovation amid logistical challenges.
title: Apple CEO Tim Cook Forecasts Holiday Quarter iPhone Sales That Top Wall Street Estimates

description: Google and Magic Leap showcased a prototype of their new Android-powered XR glasses at the Future Investment Initiative event in Riyadh. Both companies have extended their partnership with a new three-year agreement. The device uses Magic Leap’s waveguide and optical technologies with Google’s Raxium microLED light engine. It features a camera, microphones, an in-lens display and speakers.
title: Google, Magic Leap Show Off New Android XR Glasses Prototype With In-Lens Display

description: Apple has expanded its Self Service Repair programme to include the iPhone 17 lineup, covering the iPhone 17, iPhone Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max. Customers in the US, Canada, and parts of Europe can now buy genuine parts to repair displays, batteries, cameras, and more through Apple’s online store. Prices start at $99 (roughly Rs. 8,200) for batteries and go up to $379 (roughly Rs. 31,500) for certain parts. The company has not yet confirmed the availability of the programme in India.
title: iPhone 17 Series, iPhone Air Join Apple’s Self Service Repair Programme Across US, Canada and Europe

description: iQOO 15 is scheduled to be launched in India and the global markets on November 26. The handset, which was introduced in China earlier this month, is the successor to the iQOO 13. Ahead of its anticipated debut, the handset has now allegedly surfaced on a benchmarking site, which suggests several of its specifications and also hints towards its impending debut. It is listed with a flagship octa-core chipset, running on the latest Android 16 OS.
title: iQOO 15 Indian Variant Allegedly Surfaces on Geekbench With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chipset

description: Realme GT 8 Pro, which debuted in China on October 21 as part of the Realme GT 8 lineup, was recently confirmed to launch in India in November. The smartphone is confirmed to go on sale in the country via Flipkart. Now, a tipster has revealed that the Realme GT 8 Pro could launch in India in the third week of November. Since the Chinese smartphone maker has yet to announce the exact launch date, this information should be taken with a pinch of salt.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro India Launch Date Tipped After Company Confirms November Debut

description: Meta Platforms on Friday announced a new security measure for keeping WhatsApp chat backups safe by encrypting them with passkeys. With passkey-encrypted chat backups, users will not be required to memorise a password or a 64-digit encryption key anymore. Instead, they can utilise the handset's buil-in security methods, such as fingerprints or facial recognition, or even a simple screen lock code to encrypt the backup and add extra security.
title: WhatsApp Announces Passkey-Encrypted Chat Backups With Biometric Authentication for Extra Security

description: Apple has intentions of integrating with more artificial intelligence (AI) companies beyond OpenAI, CEO Tim Cook said in a conversation with a publication on Thursday. The Cupertino-based tech giant has long been rumoured to form partnerships with AI firms to have their large language models (LLMs) power features on iPhone and other Apple devices. The Apple executive also hinted towards a release timeline of Siri with more advanced capabilities, which is yet to arrive after its 2024 showcase.
title: Apple CEO Reportedly Confirms Partnership Plans Beyond OpenAI; Revamped Siri Expected to Launch in 2026

description: India’s telecom operators and AI companies are competing to attract users with free premium subscriptions. Airtel has partnered with Perplexity to offer 12 months of Perplexity Pro access, OpenAI will soon make ChatGPT Go free for a year, and Reliance Jio users can now get 18 months of Google AI Pro.
title: Jio's Gemini vs Airtel's Perplexity vs ChatGPT Go: Which Free AI Plan Is Best For You

description: November is shaping up to be an exciting month for phone enthusiasts in India. Several flagship smartphones were launched in October, but many of them did not debut in the Indian market, but that is set to change. Several flagship-grade and mid-tier handsets are expected to be launched in India next month. From OnePlus 15 to Realme GT 8 Pro, here's our list of the upcoming smartphones in November 2025.
title: Upcoming Smartphones in November 2025: OnePlus 15, Oppo Find X9 Series, Realme GT 8 Pro, and More
